name: Above Snakes
description: Become one with nature and survive a plague that is overtaking the beautiful Old West. You are Aiyana, the daughter of a tribal chief whose fate lies in discovering why the dead are rising from their graves. Whilst surviving the wilderness, you discover piece by piece - tile by tile - the truth about what happened that night in Corpse Creek. Craft your tile-based world in search of resources to help you stay above snakes.
